comments.body:
This list concatention doesn't look very pretty..
Maybe it'd better if this pass looked like this:
`override def preInst = case a => handleNull(a).flatMap(eliminateIs)`?
I don't think that it will really change much. The current solution looks good to me.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@          // else
          Inst.Label(elseL, Seq.empty)) ++
      doEliminateIs(Let(elseResultV.name, Op.Is(ty, obj))) ++
      Seq(Inst.Jump(Next.Label(contL, Seq(elseResultV))),
          // cont
